function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordination among different levels of public administrations","Impact":"Ineffective disaster management and response, increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels, standard operating procedures, and coordination mechanisms","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data sharing and collaboration tools, GIS systems","People":"Citizens, public officials, stakeholders involved in disaster management","Owner":"Public administrations, disaster management agencies"},{"Description":"Implementation of emerging technologies in early stages","Impact":"Inefficient use of technologies, failure to address key challenges in disaster management","Mitigation":"Comprehensive pilot testing, feedback mechanisms, and continuous improvement processes","Technologies":"Pilot testing platforms, feedback collection tools, continuous improvement software","People":"Technology implementers, disaster management agencies, researchers","Owner":"Local governments, disaster management agencies"},{"Description":"Limited open government data projects focused on disaster management","Impact":"Lack of vital information for effective disaster management, inability to make data-driven decisions","Mitigation":"Expansion of open government data projects, standardization of data formats, and improvement of data quality","Technologies":"Data collection and management tools, data standardization software, data quality improvement systems","People":"Public officials, data analysts, disaster management agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, data management organizations"}]}
